text:
While I was evaluating this package I found the following StackOverfolw error
with the Perl5Util class

the input string was:
Deluxe Functional Position Wrist/Hand Splint, XSmall, 5 1/4 in. -6 in. , Left.
Adjustable thermoplastic. Classic way to splint hand after a stroke-thumb in
full opposition, wrist in 30° dorsiflexion, and MPs at approximately 80°.
Includes wrist straps whi

and the regular expression was:
m#(\d(\d|\s*|\.|\/)*(hp\s*DC|DC\s*hp|hp))#i
